'''Tom Zuchowski''' ([[wikipedia:Missouri|Northwest Missouri]], c. [[1952]])<ref>[http://www.eamonag.org/articles/genielamp-interview.htm Interview with tom Zuchowski] (retrieved 27 October 2010)</ref> is the author and programmer of ''[[Thror's Ring]]''<ref name="Tolkien Games2">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/throrsring.html Thror's Ring] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 27 October 2010)</ref><ref>[http://ifdb.tads.org/viewgame?id=4aj48odgyjcpsbmm Thror's Ring] at The Interactive Fiction Database (retrieved 27 October 2010)</ref> (October [[1985]]) and ''[[Assault on Dolni Keep]]''<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/assault.html Assault on Dolni Keep] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 28 October 2010)</ref><ref>[http://ifdb.tads.org/viewgame?id=rw9quntgskgb91gg Assault on Dolni Keep] at The Interactive Fiction Database (retrieved 28 October 2010)</ref> (January [[1987]]) for the ''[[Eamon (video game)|Eamon]]'' text adventure game series. Zuchowski served as the president of the Eamon Adventurer's Guild club.
